post.body: No prob. Feel better soon.
BTW: "high on antihistamines" correlates with "high on Methamphetamines".
Nature makes 'em look that way, so you wont kill them in their sleep.
LOL, I looked at some sausage in my fridge this morning, wondering what to do - Of course, MUSSELS! Thanks CM
I think the red looks more polished. But I also like the idea of the 2-tone design.
Watching The Preacher's Wife on TNTHD, when Whitney Houston was at the top of her game. I'm gettin' chills watching her sing in church.
OMG: I'm a HDTV Widescreen Snob. If it's not, I can't.
I cant believe I'm watching a show on the History Channel about the "Bailout". We're still living this story. How can they finish the show?
Finally relaxing at home. Stomach is full. Dowsing dinner with wine. Feet up.
OK: I'm officially off work in 6 minutes - 7.5 hours longer than I think necessary.
At Work: Patient states she did some "bad Crack" this morning. Naturally, I'm curious where she gets her "good Crack".
FYI: San Francisco is rampant with anxiety today.
January 20th is gonna be a good day in America; the new season of Fringe starts.
9am, my first day of work in the new year, and I'm listening to explicit rap on @Pandora_Radio
Hang-over, done.
Hello headache.
I've got my feet on the sofa with my shoes on. :p
This champagne is making me sleepy. It's either that or the bar hopping.
sipping on a bottle of sparkling wine I should never have opened in the first place. But I always say that about wine.
WOO: This pasta is spicy!
